name: Durst
description:
Your illness will kill you soon, every movement hurts you, but an old shaman gave you hope.

Deep inside an old dungeon, a creature holds some powerful magic dust, able to cure every illness if brewed correctly.

Don't miss this last chance.

· · ·

Controls:

Left Mouse on adjacent cell: move there

Right Mouse on adjacent cell: attack in that direction

OR

W A S D to move

Arrow Keys to attack
